House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00046
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR A COMPREHENSIVE CIVIL REGISTRATION SYSTEM
SHORT TITLE : Civil Registration Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Provides for a mechanism for comprehensive and responsive civil registration, a Barangay Registration System, Free Delayed Registration Program for unregistered births due to poverty and Free Delayed Registration for Indigenous Peoples.
